if set to sso, you'll need to open a link provided in a browser to login. Set to basicAuthentication (default) the script will ask if you want to provide username and password. If set to **envVariables** you need to provide the email address and password by setting the environment variable **BTPSA_PARAM_MYEMAIL** and **BTPSA_PARAM_MYPASSWORD**. In addition you can as well provide the global account through the environment variable **BTPSA_PARAM_GLOBALACCOUNT**.
